title: Product Owner
description:
About Ferryhopper


Ferryhopper is an online travel company based in Athens, Greece. We specialise in ferry ticket sales, powered by our in-house search engine which compares ferry ticket prices and itineraries across 10 different countries, including Greece, Italy, Spain, and Turkey.

Ferryhopper has revolutionised the online ferry ticket booking process by simplifying all the complexities of ferry ticket selection: from itineraries to seats, cabins to motorbikes, and campervans to foot-passenger tickets.

We are relentless in our thrive for improving our product and the services that we provide to our users. In this respect we are looking for a Product Manager who will be responsible for the web application of Ferryhopper. We value people who enjoy analyzing needs, spotting opportunities and providing solutions even in non-well-defined problems.



Role description


Do you love travelling with ferries? Do you get passionate about making travel arrangements easy and exciting? If yes, then Ferryhopper is the right place!

As a Product Team in Ferryhopper we are always looking to deliver excellent products that make the life of travellers better and easier. We go the extra mile and provide solutions for ferry travellers even in non-well defined problems.

As a Product Owner of our website, you will have the opportunity to change the way people perceive online ferry booking. Within our team you will be responsible for leading the full life-cycle of new features, driving the respective vision, strategy and roadmap. By definition, this role is cross-functional and you will be working closely with development, design, marketing, operations, customer care, and commercial teams, to bring what matters into life.

The ideal candidate will have a track record of owning and managing technology products from conceptualization to launch, show a deep customer focus, and have a mature business judgment. Highest levels of quality in products and customer experience are among our key values in Ferryhopper and what this role will strive to deliver.


The key responsibilities:

  • Explore customer needs and receive user feedback;
  • Collaborate with stakeholders to understand their needs;
  • Work side-by-side with our developers and designers;
  • Participate and contribute to the scrum rituals of the team;
  • Prioritize projects and set goals aligned with the product strategy;
  • Own the product roadmap for the website team;
  • Break down complex ideas into executable features and priorities;
  • Define the MVP of each feature and prioritize the issues respectively;
  • Produce detailed and clear specifications for new product features, appropriately comprehensible by the engineering teams;
  • Ensure the quality of the feature to be released;
  • Measure the success and usage of the features and ensure their constant improvement.
requirements:
The profile

The succesful candidate, 

Must have:

  • At least 2 years of experience in product management and at least 4 years of experience in digital products;

  • A proven track record of bringing to life experiences that users love, shown through your ability to conceptualize, define and deliver;

  • Comfort with transforming vague ideas into clear actions;

  • A sharp, analytical mind: your decisions are data-driven and supported by the data that you have researched and collected;

  • Understanding fundamental design and usability principles behind a scalable application;

  • Well versed in lean product development and agile engineering methodologies such as Scrum and/or Kanban;

  • Familiarity with project / task management tools (Youtrack, JIRA, Trello, Asana, etc.);

  • Great communication and organizational skills; you will be functioning in an international environment.


It would be nice to have:

  • Studies in the field of Engineering, Information Technology, Management of Digital Products or Product Design;

  • Prior experience in the creation of digital travel or e-commerce products;

  • A career with strong focus on UX, UI and Design Thinking;

  • A proven track record that you love travelling (just kidding).


Benefits

The health of our company and the success of our products is directly related to the health of our team and the work environment we create for ourselves. With this in mind, we strive to provide an inclusive and positive working environment. In this respect, we offer:


  • Quick professional development.
  • Equipment of your choice;

  • Training and educational budget throughout the year.

  • Joining a fast-growing ambitious international team.

  • Work in a collaborative and dynamic environment of young people.


Ferryhopper is an equal opportunity employer that welcomes diversity and is committed to inclusion in the workplace. We do not accept discrimination and harassment of any kind. This policy applies to all employment practices within our company.

title: Multilingual Customer Support Representative
description:
The Company

Ferryhopper is revolutionizing online ferry booking. We are collaborating with more than 50 major and smaller ferry companies to offer ferry itineraries to 250 destinations in the Mediterranean and we will keep expanding our horizons to new destinations. We always strive to cater to the needs of all travelers and to improve our services.


The Role

Selling ferry tickets creates a whole host of questions from our customers, and we pride ourselves on the highest level of customer support in the market. Last year our customer support team interacted in over 41.000 different conversations with different customers; keeping all of them satisfied is no small task, but if you feel up to it, we want to hear from you! We are looking for a seasonal customer support agent to join our fast-growing team in Athens.

The successful candidate will be responsible to handle customers’ requests and maintain an excellent tailor-made customer experience. We value people who take pride in their work and enjoy the challenge involved in delivering outstanding results.


Main responsibilities

  • Receive & process incoming calls & emails

  • Handle general requests in several communication channels

  • Execute ferry tickets cancellations, rebookings and other inquiries

  • Handle force majeure such as strikes or extreme weather events, bulk changes

  • Communicate with Ferry operators and partners

  • Report technical issues internally

  • Suggest improvements to the operational process to ensure the smoothest possible functioning of the team as a whole
requirements:

  • Excellent communication in English

  • Quality focus and multitasking in a fast-paced environment

  • Dedication to going above and beyond to solve customers' problems

  • Self-motivated, strong time-management and problem solving skills

  • A relentless team player, willing to share ideas and help other team members

  • Work in a collaborative and dynamic environment of young people

title: Junior Account Manager - Greece (Italian Speaker)
description:
The Company

Ferryhopper is an online travel company based in Athens, Greece. We specialise in ferry ticket sales, powered by our in-house search engine which compares ferry ticket prices and itineraries across 10 different countries, including Greece, Italy, Spain and Turkey.

Ferryhopper has revolutionised the online ferry booking process by simplifying all the complexities of ferry ticket selection: from itineraries to seats, cabins to motorbikes, and campervans to foot-passenger tickets.

Ferryhopper is determined to become the Global Ferry Expert, which can only happen through strong partnerships with our suppliers: the ferry companies. We are looking for someone to join our account management team and nurture the relationships we have built with ferry companies in the Greek market. Interacting effectively with our suppliers allows us to provide our final customers with the best ferry booking engine on the market.

The Position

In a sentence, you will support the communication between Ferryhopper and some Greek ferry companies.

In more detail, you will be asked to:


  • Support the maintenance an effective relationship with relevant stakeholders in each account under your management;

  • Implement, with support from the Senior Account Manager, an action plan for each account on a regular basis;

  • Support in troubleshooting any issues that arise with these accounts, ranging from operational, to technical, through to marketing and of course covering commercial concerns.

By doing the above, you will be directly enabling Ferryhopper to:

  • Provide the most complete and up-to-date ferry booking engine on the market;

  • Secure our recently gained influential position in the Greek market, building credibility for our continued geographic expansion;

  • Maximise the value of our recent and rapid market growth in Greece;

  • Stay fully relevant to our market as we continue to grow, reacting effectively and timely to any changes that could affect us;

  • Transition from the up-and-coming outsider to the established and understood market leader;
requirements:
The Successful Candidate

To achieve this, you will need to be:

  • Excited about working with a wide variety of people from within the ferry industry: building sustainable long-term commercial relationships with them;

  • An avid problem solver, always looking for the best solution for your accounts within Ferryhopper’s product;

  • Data oriented, and evidence driven, looking to understand why and how different accounts are behaving differently on our platform;

  • Perfectly fluent in Greek with a strong business level of English & Italian 

  • Comfortable working with a wide range of basic digital platforms (Office Suites, CRM, Task Management, etc)

We are open to a wide range of applicants for this position, with proven experience valued above educational achievements, however any points on the following list will strengthen your application:

  • A degree in a relevant field such as Business Administration, Commerce, Trade or other;

  • Experience of successfully maintaining and upgrading an existing list of accounts;

Organisational set-up

The successful applicant will be reporting to the Senior Account Manager, in the Commercial Department.

title: Business Intelligence Analyst
description:
The company

We are collaborating with more than 53 major and smaller ferry companies to offer ferry itineraries to 250 destinations in the Mediterranean and we will keep expanding our horizons to new destinations. We always strive to cater to the needs of all travelers and to improve our services.

The role

Being a constantly growing team that works and maintains a large spectrum of data, we are looking for a Business Intelligence Analyst to join our BI team. The successful candidate will collaborate with all other departments, analyze the company-wide and departmental BI requirements and processes, and propose BI insights, solutions, and strategies.
requirements:
Responsibilities


  • Learn and fully understand the company’s data landscape

  • Develop and manage BI solutions for the organization

  • Translate business needs into high-level technical specifications and design

  • Use knowledge of the available data and forecasting/analysis methods to provide insightful suggestions to business stakeholders

  • Work and coordinate with all company departments and BI consumers to identify reporting and analytical requirements, and make recommendations for reporting/BI solutions.

  • Work with other departments to set and maintain meaningful KPIs

  • Develop deep understanding of the various business processes, data sets and BI deliverables

  • Ensure and assess our data quality and validity, overview analytics and metrics results

  • Enable other departments and the overall business by creating dashboards and reports

  • Excellent knowledge of Google Analytics

  • Working knowledge of BI and data warehouse concepts and terminology

What we would consider a plus

  • Experience with analytical programming languages such as Python and R

  • Experience with BigQuery or other data warehouses

Our ideal candidate is someone who

  • Has excellent analytical and problem-solving skills

  • Is capable of prioritizing multiple projects

title: UX researcher
description:
About Ferryhopper

Ferryhopper is revolutionizing online ferry booking! We are collaborating with more than 60 major and smaller ferry companies to offer ferry routes to 250 destinations in Southern Europe and Northern Africa. We always strive to cater to the needs of all travelers and to improve our services.


Role description

Users are the center of our design. And having evidence on what troubles the users is the cornerstone of providing solutions that matter. We are looking for an experienced UX researcher to join our product team and help us enhance the user experience of our products through an analysis of user behavior before and after the release of new features.

The key responsibilities:

  • Define the right research method and audience for the testing of each feature

  • Audit our applications and spot UX bottlenecks and pain points

  • Collaborate with the UX/UI designers and product managers to discuss the proposed approach and test new designs and concepts

  • Conduct moderated and unmoderated usability tests both in-lab and remotely

  • Analyze the data, present the findings and explore solutions in collaboration with the product team

  • Measure the impact of new features after their implementation
requirements:
Requirements

As a successful candidate, you are required to have:

  • Experience in executing moderated user-tests regarding the UX of a product

  • Experience in setting up, running, and analyzing unmoderated tests using 3rd-party user pools

  • Real passion for creative, user-centered solutions

  • Strong analytical skills that enable you to decompose a problem and define tests that will uncover the ideal solution

  • Excellent communication, presentation, and reporting skills

  • 3+ years of professional applied research experience


We would also highly appreciate:

  • Good knowledge of Google Analytics and data analysis platforms

  • Ability to set up prototypes using Figma or another design tool

  • Experience in setting up A/B tests with tools like Google Optimize, Optimizely, etc

title: UX/UI designer
description:
Our Company

Ferryhopper is revolutionizing online ferry booking! We are collaborating with more than 60 major and smaller ferry companies to offer ferry routes to 250 destinations in Southern Europe and Northern Africa. We always strive to cater to the needs of all travelers and to improve our services.


Our Teams

In the organization of our teams we follow a matrix approach. Horizontally you will be working with other UX and UI designers, and vertically you will collaborate closely with a product manager and a software development team. On the z-axis, you will work with all other teams to understand needs and present ideas.


Your Role

As a UX/UI designer at Ferryhopper, you’ll be an interaction designer and a visual designer in equal parts. As an interaction designer, you will be responsible for enhancing customer satisfaction and loyalty by improving the usability and ease of use of our online products. As a visual designer, you will produce visual designs that align with brand values and style. A user centred approach should be inside everything you do.


More specifically you will need to:


Discover

> Understand the product’s strategic goals, user needs and technical constraints that define the UX/UI space;

> Identify and analyze the pain points of the UX/UI flow and propose solutions;

> Collaborate with the product manager and the team members to brainstorm solutions or ways of approaching the design challenge;


Design, prototype & test

> Produce wireframes of the proposed solution to gather initial feedback;

> Produce, present and review high-resolution designs, aligned with the company’s visual identity;

>  Produce demo prototypes that help evaluate the overall flow and experience of the product. We use Adobe XD and Figma on a day to day basis;

> Prepare tests and scenarios for users and participate in the user testing sessions by capturing feedback;


Deliver for development

> Annotate design deliverables to ensure the design intent is clearly communicated to the development team;

> Provide thorough specifications that fully describe the desired behavior of the features and enable the dev team to proceed to implementation;

> Review the implementation of the designs to ensure it meets business goals and design intent.
requirements:
Experience

We’re looking for a creative team player who wants to build relevant and long-lasting solutions on behalf of millions of customers. If you enjoy complex design challenges, validating ideas with data and customer research, and have a strong belief in the value of collaboration, then do not hesitate to apply for this position.


What we are looking for:

  • At least 3 years’ designing experience on Web and Mobile applications;
  • Professional experience with design & prototyping tools such as Adobe XD, Figma and Illustrator;
  • Passion about achieving great UX using user data;
  • Extended experience in usability and A/B Testing;
  • Exceptional visual design skills;
  • Good understanding of CSS & HTML would be an asset;
  • Comfortable working in iterative design process;
  • Experience working within design and development teams in an agile environment;


Benefits

Our team is our number one priority; we offer an amazing working environment. This includes:

  • Competitive compensation package
  • Equipment of your choice
  • Access to training and education material
  • Great office space at the heart of Athens
  • Currently we are in a work from home setup but we will return at the office. We love sharing the same working environment. However, we remain flexible in working hours & remote working


How to submit your application

Please note that it is required to provide your online portfolio along with your CV or as a separate file in order for your application to be considered
